title: About Me
text:
Hi, I’m Min Sung Seo 👋
I’m a cognitive psychology researcher interested in memory, aging, and prediction error.
My work combines behavioral experiments and fMRI to understand how prediction errors shape memory updating, with a particular focus on age-related differences.



🎓 Ph.D. Candidate in Cognitive Psychology, UNC Chapel Hill (2025)

📍 Incoming Postdoc at Penn State (starting Aug 2025)

🧠 Research Interests: Episodic memory, predictive processing, hippocampal subfields
